nodes.text: Star Wars The Empire Strikes Back Mobile

Star Wars The Empire Strikes Back Mobile is an action/arcade mobile java game published by THQ, based around a series of mini-games where the player participates in the key events from the Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back movie.

Players are able to take control of Luke Skywalker and use various Star Wars vehicles, including a T-47 airspeeder or the Millennium Falcon, in gameplay. Players travel through the various worlds of the Star Wars universe, fly through asteroid fields, train with Yoda and even fight the mighty Imperial Military on foot!
